mapper.select: select member_id from member_login where member_id = #{memberId}
select member_id AS memberId ,member_level AS memberLevel from member_login where member_id = #{memberId} and member_pw = #{memberPw}
select m.member_id AS memberId ,m.member_level AS memberLevel ,me.member_name AS memberName from member_login m inner join member me on m.member_id = me.member_id where m.member_id = #{memberId}
select member_email from member where member_email = #{memberEmail}
